analysis.key_quote: I strongly oppose the proposed rule, as it will severely damage US science and innovation, one of our major exports, by making possible the replacement of subject matter experts with political appointees who have little or no domain expertise and, thus, have no capacity for understanding or judging the scientific merits of research grant proposals.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule and highlights concerns about the potential replacement of qualified experts with political appointees, which aligns with themes of merit-based systems and politicization.
